dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.value
dt-option.summary: Set the placeholder text for the SearchBuilder value `-tag select` element

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.value` changes what will be displayed for the placeholder text in the SearchBuilder's value select.

dt-option.description: This will set the placeholder text for the value `-tag select` element, by default this is `'Value'`. This dom element is available in custom conditions and plugins also.
